description:
As your number one marketing tool, if you don't have an engaging resume and cover letter, you're significantly reducing your chances of career success. This clinic will provide you with a step-by-step guide to prepare a professional level resume that clearly demonstrates your individual career journey, skills and experience.

Our career clinics are delivered as videocasts, which is like a virtual one to one, and enables you to pace your learning to suit your own timeframes and work/life demands.

Utilising a resume template provided, students will work alongside the course instructor to develop their own comprehensive resume, step by step. With clear instructions on what to include and where to include it, students are able to build a resume that will highlight all of their relevant skills and experience, whilst ensuring maximum engagement from recruiters and hiring managers.

This course will take approximately 3 to 5 hours to complete, if you are building your resume as you go - there is a total of approximately 1 hour of video content.

By completing this course you will develop a skill that will last across your career and that will also enable you to build a confident narrative of your career story so you can ace those interviews!
title: Career Clinic - A step by step guide to your best resume yet
